CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Excellent knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Eric Michael Sr has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 12 years. Currently he is employed as a Business Analyst/Technical Analyst at Green Tree Servicing. Eric has extensive knowledge of Microsoft Visio, JAD, Rational RequisitePro, Activity Diagrams, Web Services, Stored Procedures, Software Development Life Cycle, SDLC, Rational Rose, RUP methodology, Agile Methodology. Eric has an extensive management experience (5.2 years) with exposure to executive/middle management positions.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2002-10 for 63 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Operations Manager/Technical Analyst at CitiMortgage.
